name: X Mushrooms(X蘑菇)
description: Girls X Mushroom is an indie game developed by Wild Grunt and is a third-person perspective action game. The game emphasizes intense fighting.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows7, Windows8, Windows10 Processor: Core i3 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GT 820M DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows7, Windows8, Windows10 Processor: Core i3 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 650 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space
